description: {*Massive {&marble{* stone pillars stretch high into the rock walls,

and {RT{rri{Bp{bower{* stretch {*down.  To the far north between the two pillars
stands the {RT{rhrone{* of {bN{*ightmares.  {* On either side of the throne stand
two statues.  The circular {&marble{* floor shines in the flames of the
torches, the marble died to colors, {*taking the form of the {R4 B{rars{* of
the {RT{rri{Bp{bower{*.  A slogan wraps around the {*bars.  {c"{CJuas Ver Zayes Kardar
Xavr Portok{c",{* its meaning unknown.  In the {*center the marble is
chipped out, and an iron bar can be seen, looking {*like a trap door.  A
strange {&w{*in{&d{* tends to be blowing around the room.  {x

acrossed {*the rock walls, cut from large trees.  They are roughly
spaced apart, and {*{Yl{yigh{Yt{* shines from beneath.  Above a large stone
ceiling, with a square {*in the middle, an opening between the dungeon
and throne room.  The Dungeon {*represents almost a jail.  A slab of
{ywood{* hangs down from the rock walls, {*nothing for cusioning.  An old
dirty {&toilet{* sits to one corner, which does {*not look sanitary.  A
diseased {7skeleton{* of a human sits next to the toilet, {*a strong smell
of rot, as open sores ooze with pus.  From the walls hang {*various
chains and shackles, and a {Rl{rocked {bc{&hest{*...  With devices.  {x

description: {8The room has a darkness to it, almost a chill, and prying eyes.
There's a eerieness to the room.  A mist floats a few feet below the
ceiling.  The mist is mind-boggling, entrapping, mystifying.  You feel
drowsy yet alert for you feel danger.  The mist folds around the door
to the south.  You are trapped!

these grounds.  Spattered on the walls, and staining the floor is

description: {DMassive battles once raged between the {RC{rhurch {Dof {bN{Dightmares on

description: {CM{ca{Cg{ci{Cc{ca{Cl {Dpowers from a broken spell casting circle have destroyed
the very fibers of reality in this area of the {RC{rhurch {Dof {bN{Dightmares.
There seems to be no end to expanding chaos.  {x
12357.name: {RW{raking {bN{Dightmares{x

description: {DArmor, shields, swords, and various other garments line the walls
of the {RA{rrmory{D.  Some items are truely {bN{Dightmarish in thier nature, yet
others have a soft {Cd{cr{wea{cm{Cy {Dappearance.  A strange aura of tranquility
radiates from the west tainting the darkness of this room.  {x
12305.name: {bC{Dhurch {RA{rrmory{x

description: {DThere are several cages buried beneath the rubble from the
collapsed northern wall.  The creatures {Dkept inside have long since
been freed to create terror amongst the realms.  {x
12390.name: {RC{raged {bN{Dightmares{x

description: {DA single dead tree stands alone in the darkness of a massive
cavern.  Somewhere the cavern opens to the surface, for fresh air
mingles with the stench of the feces coating the ground.  {DEntrails of
various animals hang down from branches, they seem to sway in an
unseen breeze.  {x
12316.name: {RV{rassal's {bR{Doost{x

description: {DCircling around the altar, these corridors serve as a passage from
the {RC{rhurch {Dof {bN{Dightmares to the catacombs beneath it.  {x
12372.name: {bO{Dutter {RC{rorridor{x

description:
{&A slim {7weasel{& or polecat type creature stands before you, its furr
pure white and its eyes blazing red.  It scuttles around the area
exploring and searching every possible nook and cranny.  And stops
and looks up at surrounding people and beasts, checking to see if
such a creature could be killed.  Around its neck wraps a black iron
chain, a very small chain.  A tag hangs down reading "{CPet of Nisstyre{&"{x
12344.room_name: {&A pure {7white{& ferret scurries around the room.{x
12344.name: {CW{7e{Bes{7e{Cr{x~

eyes.  {*It scuttles around the area exploring and searching every
possible nook {*and cranny.  And stops and looks up at surrounding
people and beasts, {*checking to see if such a creature could be killed.

next to you cringe, as it assumes the form of thier deepest terror.

around it.  {x
